div.p: The above prices including Cover & Binding

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: The work to be executed in same style and size of type as the 1888 Edition. A sample sheet of paper is enclosed.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p:
Every attention will be given to the correct production of the work.
See M to T. Wilson, 4 April 1891.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: We have the honor to be, Dear Sir
